comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.body: grr - embarrsing - spent all that time with the src dist and not enough with the binary dist - db and misc are missing too - I"ve fixed db and analyzers working on misc now

comments.author: Uwe Schindler
comments.body: is this because analyzers and db have sub-module folders?

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.body: okay - misc is there - there is also just a miscellaneous folder with just a readme.txt in it - about to find the fix for that...

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.body:
bq. is this because analyzers and db have sub-module folders? 

Yup - the build process only went 1 deep for jars

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.body: the misc problem stems from having the folder as miscellanous and then a shorted misc form that gets sent out - this is confusing an error prone - other build files have to refer to both long and short version. I'm just going to rename the folder to misc and make everything the short version unless anyone objects.

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.body: okay - I think I've addressed it all - will leave this open until im 1000% sure

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.body: Okay, I think its good - that misc issue was actually in the last release so I think I made the right move with the rename
